programmes.show_description: Stage Fright. Stephanie is a gifted stage performer and much-loved teacher. But behind closed doors, resentment and envy fester in her marriage, leading to a shocking 911 call. S7, Ep7
It Could Be Me. Michelle Lira dreams of being a doctor, until one day a rollercoaster romance steers her life in a different direction, straight into a deadly ambush. S7, Ep8
Gold Pontiac. Amanda Douglas and Jennifer Sudar Sanders are shot dead after a night out. Police examine surveillance footage to track down the callous killer. S7, Ep7
Back To Reality. Police are alerted to a dead body that's been hidden in a suitcase and thrown into a dumpster. Surveillance footage helps solve this shocking crime. S7, Ep8

Mysterious Injuries. When the Michigan Humane Society investigate a suspected case of dog beating, they find something else. Plus, two abandoned labradors have a mystery condition. S4, Ep7
True Crime. Crime writers know as much about crime as any crime-fighter - or criminal. They can provide as near a first-person account of a murder as is possible. S3, Ep14
Coroner's Casebook. A good coroner provides what is necessary to solve a crime. A bad one can ruin an otherwise rock-solid case. S3, Ep15
A Bitter End. A series of bank robberies in Texas leave authorities baffled. When similar heists begin the next year in California, FBI agents link the crimes. S6, Ep12
Dangerous Gamble. Two masked robbers armed with semi-automatic weapons robbed armoured car couriers of $350,000 in the MGM Grand Hotel and Casino in Las Vegas. S6, Ep13
Michelle Stewart/David Irwin. A young woman's ex-boyfriend refuses to take no for an answer. Plus, a young father is left fighting for his life after a brutal assault. S5, Ep10
Down For The Count. Morris Blankenbaker is a happy family man until he gets thrust into a love triangle with his friend and wife. But hidden rivalries lead to his chilling death. S1, Ep7
Billy Smolinski: Favourite Son. Billy disappears just after finding out his girlfriend is cheating on him. Is she behind it, or will a perpetrator emerge from beyond the grave? S1, Ep5
Not In Life, Not In Sleep. After Cristina goes missing, a man spotted on CCTV may hold the answers to the Minnesota woman's mysterious disappearance. S10, Ep11
Ben Lacomba. When Sarah Wellgreen suddenly disappears, detectives desperately search for her. But after discovering no evidence, they investigate closer to home. S3, Ep10
Draw A Picture. Elena falls for bad boy Brandon, who poses as a loving father. But his jealousy and violent control soon spiral into devastating consequences. S11, Ep8
My Brother's Keeper. Tymeir shines as the loving son, but his brother Rodney's jealousy boils over, driving him to a hideous act of violence that tears their family apart. S11, Ep9

programmes.show_name: American Detective With Lt Joe Kenda
programmes.show_description: Valentine's Day Murder. After the strangulation of a New Jersey mother on Valentine's Day, solving the case comes down to a pair of bangles, and a chance encounter at a deli. S4, Ep1
13 Years A Slave And 45k Family Fraud. A vulnerable man goes missing but the truth behind his disappearance is even more sinister than could ever have been imagined. S2, Ep2
Nowhere Girl. In 2020, Dioneth Lopez's body turned up in the woodlands of Washington State. Detectives must find surveillance to piece together her final hour. S9, Ep13
Looking For Angela. A reclusive mother vanishes in the summer of 2019 from her Kansas home. Every lead quickly fades despite her husband's ever-changing stories. S9, Ep4
We All Go A Little Mad. Police find a family dead, a horror film still playing, a bloody mask nearby - and a letter addressed to the woman who voiced 'The Exorcist' demon. S1, Ep3
Michelle Stewart/David Irwin. A young woman's ex-boyfriend refuses to take no for an answer. Plus, a young father is left fighting for his life after a brutal assault. S5, Ep10
Say Your Prayers. When teenager LaTonya Taylor gets pregnant, her mum vows to support her no matter what. But someone's hiding resentment that will destroy the whole family. S7, Ep9
About To Break. When newly divorced Wendi Davidson meets charming Brian Chevalier, it seems to be the perfect remedy for heartbreak. But all is not as blissful as it seems. S7, Ep10
Last Night Apart. Adrianne Robert was found dead by her roommate after a night out. Investigators use security footage to hunt for a calculated killer. S7, Ep9
Four And A Half Minutes. A grainy parking lot video is the lone witness to a Tacoma, Washington, father's tragic execution. Police rely on security cameras to find the killer. S7, Ep10

Deserted Dogs. Investigators decide if the owner of two pit bulls with severe mange should be prosecuted, and rescue an ailing puppy that is starving and dehydrated. S4, Ep8
Remnant of Blame. Investigators must determine the full story of a murder from a tiny scrap of evidence in order to solve a heinous crime. S4, Ep1
Partners in Crime. Investigates partners who commit crimes, including two cab drivers, and a new DNA technique that can extract clues from four-year-old evidence. S4, Ep2
Dangerous Takedown. In 1997 two burglars broke into a home and shot at a police officer. One year later clues to the location of the suspects are revealed. S6, Ep14
Inside The Bureau. When a bank manager was unable to open the bank vault, the FBI was called in, revealing a sophisticated burglary with estimated losses of $8 million. S6, Ep15
Adrian Prout. The former fiancée of wealthy farmer and landowner, Adrian Prout, reveals what it was like living with a man who lied about killing his wife. S3, Ep1
True Crime. Crime writers know as much about crime as any crime-fighter - or criminal. They can provide as near a first-person account of a murder as is possible. S3, Ep14
Coroner's Casebook. A good coroner provides what is necessary to solve a crime. A bad one can ruin an otherwise rock-solid case. S3, Ep15
Remnant of Blame. Investigators must determine the full story of a murder from a tiny scrap of evidence in order to solve a heinous crime. S4, Ep1
A Hole In Time. When single dad David Heisler goes missing, clues lead detectives into the desert, but the trail stops cold. Digital forensics experts to help unravel this mystery. S2, Ep1
The Vest. When widow Valena Shepherd is found dead at home, police suspect foul play. Investigators follow digital clues that suggest Valena knew her killer. S2, Ep7
Searching for Mr. Wrong. When Nikki McPhatter doesn't show up for her usual work shift, her friends immediately worry - and point investigators to her online relationships. S4, Ep8
Partners In Crime. Sam Dreher and his wife are the perfect couple. But when Sam falls in love with another woman, his affair triggers a chain of events that spirals out of control. S5, Ep7
Swipe Right For Murder. When Ashley Pegram goes missing after meeting a man through a dating app, police discover she is caught up in a nightmarish trap set by an online predator. S5, Ep10
People You May Know. Lorianna Parker is excited when she meets handsome Corey Davis online. But when she goes to meet him in the flesh, her dream date turns into a living nightmare. S4, Ep3
She Had No Name. A young woman vanishes into a patrol car. For 35 years, she's a Jane Doe, until hypnosis reveals a clue that unmasks a predator hiding in plain sight. S1, Ep5
Feared Silent. After a call on Friday the 13th, José Herran vanishes. As police dig in, they find a town where fear reigns, pain is ritual, and horror thrives. S1, Ep6
Groomed For Murder. Luke Harlow imprisoned a schoolgirl in his flat before Stephen Beadman raped and murdered her. Experts reveal how they gave away their guilt within moments. S5, Ep2
